If we don't get our act together soon, extreme weather disturbances will continue to get more severe. We need a Green New Deal.

I want everyone in California to be safe in the event of a wildfire. A couple things you can do: make sure that you have an evacuation plan. Think about your medications, important documents, photos that you can’t replace, and of course, your pets. Have a bag ready to go.

One last photo today. 

Always and forever, @DouglasEmhoff. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EgEZmpbXsAUvE6Q.jpg

RT @CAgovernor Keep the six "P's" ready in case immediate evacuation is required:
🐶 People & pets
📜 Papers, phone numbers & important documents
💊 Prescriptions
📸 Pictures
💻 Personal computers
💳 "Plastic" (credit cards, ATM cards) & cash
 
Learn more: @CAL_FIRE
